00032 template< typename T >
00033 class memory1d {
00034         public:
00039                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00040 
00045                 typedef T value_type;
00046 
00047 
00053                 CUPP_HOST CUPP_DEVICE
00054                 size_type size() const;
00055 
00056 
00063                 CUPP_DEVICE
00064                 T& operator[]( size_type size_type );
00065 
00072                 CUPP_DEVICE
00073                 T const& operator[]( size_type index ) const;
00074 
00075         private:
00079                 T* device_pointer_;
00080 
00084                 size_type size_;
00085 }; // class memory1d
00086 
00087 
00088 template <typename T>
00089 T& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) {
00090         return device_pointer_[index];
00091 }
00092 
00093 template <typename T>
00094 T const& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00095         return device_pointer_[index];
00096 }

00100 typename memory1d<T>::size_type memory1d<T>::size() const {
00101         return size_;
